about_the_game:
Do you love Japanese alphabet, Zombies and Rock 'n' roll ? Then this is a game for you!

OVERVIEW

KANAPOCALYPSE is an educative RPG guesser game. Train your Hiragana and Katakana while raiding a city during the apocalypse. Earn money, buy new weapons and keep study/learn more Japanese alphabet.

KEY FEATURES

3 GAME MODES: Choose between Hiragana, Katakana or PRO (including both Kana)
2 ALPHABETS: Hiragana and Katakana also includes Digraphs and Diacritics
10 DIFFICULTY LEVELS: Each difficulty levels increase kana's number, number of zombies and their hitpoints
LEARNING PROGRESSION: Starts learning on low difficulty and progress until you can finally beat the PRO mode
30 WEAPONS: Raiding missions gives you money to buy weapons (melee and ranged weapons)
CRITICALS: Choose your weapons wisely to improve your critical chances in-game
7 AREAS: Explore 7 different parts of the city
FIND YOUR MISSING BEAR: On each missions, you can find your missing bear. Find it and collect a better reward
STATS: All your stats (kills, good answers, etc..) are available from the main menu
LOCAL SAVES: Your progression is save locally on your computer. Use the Reset button in the settings to start a fresh game

HAPPY KANAPOCALYPSE RAIDS !

content_descriptors.notes: Basic cartoon violence, but no realistic or shocking content. Enemies are zombies.

name: KANAPOCALYPSE

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 Go VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 1280 x 720 or higher display
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
